content: X-C MX Concrete nails (collated) Premium collated nails for fastening to concrete using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Nail for fastenings on concrete Premium fastener for attaching a variety of thin materials to masonry block and concrete Suitable for soft to medium-hard concrete (up to 45 N/mm² concrete strength) Best suited for fastening to concrete with a hardness of up to 6,000 psi Strips of 10 collated nails – for extremely high productivity and easier fastener loading Applications Fastening wood to concrete, e.g. formwork boards, safety barriers, etc. Fastening thin wood profiles to concrete Attaching drywall track to masonry block and concrete Fastening HVAC duct strapping or suspended ceilings to concrete Fastening termination bars to secure waterproofing membrane or moisture barriers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick) Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 80 mm Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.14 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 3496962 -
